actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that the courts of the United States shall have jurisdiction to review decisions of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.

summary.text: Confers on the courts of the United States jurisdiction to review, in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act, decisions of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs on any question of law or fact under any law administered by the Veterans' Administration providing benefits for veterans and their dependents or survivors.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that the courts of the United States shall have jurisdiction to review decisions of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.
